task_summary: The robot arm is instructed to reach a towel placed flat on a green work surface. The sequence includes locating the towel, moving above it, approaching with alignments, and verifying arrival.

task_long_description.overview: This episode features a bimanual manipulator (xArm) tasked with reaching a towel lying on a work surface (green base, pink towel). The robot begins from a home position and must perceive the towel, approach above it with precise alignment, and verify arrival at the designated target. Visual cues are critical for object localization, no grasp event is visible. The procedure prioritizes perception and approach; manipulation/grasp is not observed.
preconditions: Towel is present and visible on the workspace
stepwise_plan: If not, scan workspace to locate towel
Move wrist/EE to position above towel
success_criteria: Manipulator is positioned above the towel
No collision or errors during approach
failure_and_recovery: Failure to perceive towel: retry scan
task_long_description.termination: Task ends upon arrival at and verification of target towel location above the surface.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Checks if the towel is currently visible.
Performs systematic scan to locate the towel.
Detects and localizes the towel visually.
Moves the end effector above the towel at a safe offset.
Approaches & aligns precisely over the towel.
Verifies arrival at the towel's pose.

failure_modes: MoveAbove fails due to path blockage
recovery_strategy: Retry scan if towel not visible
Repeat approach and alignment on misalignment
Abort or log on repeated movement failure
assumptions: Instruction did not specify grasping; frames show approach without contact or lift.
No manipulation observed; BT omits grasp or transfer actions.
Workspace in visual frames matches a simple reach scenario.

expected_success_criteria: Manipulator arrives above the towel at specified pose.
No interaction with towel is required (no grasp, no transfer).
